cnd17:2.3: Paṭhamenapi jhānena jhāyī, dutiyenapi jhānena jhāyī, tatiyenapi jhānena jhāyī, catutthenapi jhānena jhāyī, savitakkasavicārenapi jhānena jhāyī, avitakkavicāramattenapi jhānena jhāyī, avitakkaavicārenapi jhānena jhāyī, sappītikenapi jhānena jhāyī, nippītikenapi jhānena jhāyī, sātasahagatenapi jhānena jhāyī, upekkhāsahagatenapi jhānena jhāyī, suññatenapi jhānena jhāyī, animittenapi jhānena jhāyī, appaṇihitenapi jhānena jhāyī, lokiyenapi jhānena jhāyī, lokuttarenapi jhānena jhāyī jhānarato ekattamanuyutto sadatthagarukoti—
cnd17:2.5: **Virajan**ti rāgo rajo, doso rajo, moho rajo, kodho rajo, upanāho rajo …pe… sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā rajā.
cnd17:2.6: Te rajā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
cnd17:2.7: Tasmā buddho arajo virajo nirajo rajāpagato rajavippahīno rajavippayutto sabbarajavītivatto.
cnd17:3.1: Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
cnd17:4.1: Doso rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
cnd17:5.1: Moho rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
cnd17:8.2: Atha vā bhagavā sabbossukkapaṭippassaddhattā āsīno vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo …pe… jātimaraṇasaṁsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti.
cnd17:10.1: **Katakiccaṁ anāsavan**ti buddhassa bhagavato kiccākiccaṁ karaṇīyākaraṇīyaṁ pahīnaṁ ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
cnd17:12.4: Te āsavā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
cnd17:13.1: **Pāraguṁ sabbadhammānan**ti bhagavā sabbadhammānaṁ abhiññāpāragū pariññāpāragū pahānapāragū bhāvanāpāragū sacchikiriyāpāragū samāpattipāragū.
cnd17:13.2: Abhiññāpāragū sabbadhammānaṁ, pariññāpāragū sabbadukkhānaṁ, pahānapāragū sabbakilesānaṁ, bhāvanāpāragū catunnaṁ maggānaṁ, sacchikiriyāpāragū nirodhassa, samāpattipāragū sabbasamāpattīnaṁ.
cnd17:13.7: So pāragato pārappatto antagato antappatto koṭigato koṭippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosānagato vosānappatto tāṇagato tāṇappatto leṇagato leṇappatto saraṇagato saraṇappatto abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbānagato nibbānappatto.
cnd17:13.8: So vuttavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo …pe… jātimaraṇasaṁsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti—
cnd17:14.1: **Atthi pañhena āgaman**ti pañhena atthiko āgatomhi, pañhaṁ pucchitukāmo āgatomhi, pañhaṁ sotukāmo āgatomhīti, evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṁ.
cnd17:14.2: Atha vā pañhatthikānaṁ pañhaṁ pucchitukāmānaṁ pañhaṁ sotukāmānaṁ āgamanaṁ abhikkamanaṁ upasaṅkamanaṁ payirupāsanaṁ atthīti, evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṁ.
cnd17:14.3: Atha vā pañhāgamo tuyhaṁ atthi, tvampi pahu tvamasi alamatto mayā pucchitaṁ kathetuṁ visajjetuṁ, vahassetaṁ bhāranti, evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṁ.
cnd17:15.2: Arahattavimokkhaṁ pabrūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti—
cnd17:16.1: **Avijjāya pabhedanan**ti avijjāya bhedanaṁ pabhedanaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhaṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
cnd17:19.2: **Chando**ti yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasineho kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṁ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmupādānaṁ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṁ.
cnd17:19.3: **Pahānaṁ kāmacchandānan**ti kāmacchandānaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
cnd17:20.2: **Domanassā**ti yaṁ cetasikaṁ asātaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ asātaṁ dukkhaṁ vedayitaṁ, cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā.
cnd17:20.3: **Domanassāna cūbhayan**ti kāmacchandassa ca domanassassa ca ubhinnaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
cnd17:21.2: **Thinan**ti yā cittassa akalyatā akammaññatā olīyanā sallīyanā līnā līyanā līyitattaṁ thinaṁ thiyanā thiyitattaṁ cittassa.
cnd17:21.3: **Panūdanan**ti thinassa ca panūdanaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
cnd17:22.2: **Kukkuccan**ti hatthakukkuccampi kukkuccaṁ, pādakukkuccampi kukkuccaṁ, hatthapādakukkuccampi kukkuccaṁ.
cnd17:22.5: Yaṁ evarūpaṁ kukkuccaṁ kukkuccāyanā kukkuccāyitattaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho, idaṁ vuccati kukkuccaṁ.
cnd17:22.6: Api ca dvīhi kāraṇehi uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho—
cnd17:22.8: Kathaṁ katattā ca akatattā ca uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho?
cnd17:22.9: “Kataṁ me kāyaduccaritaṁ, akataṁ me kāyasucaritan”ti uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
cnd17:22.12: “kato me pāṇātipāto, akatā me pāṇātipātā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.13: “kataṁ me adinnādānaṁ, akatā me adinnādānā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.14: “kato me kāmesumicchācāro, akatā me kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.15: “kato me musāvādo, akatā me musāvādā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.16: “katā me pisuṇā vācā, akatā me pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.17: “katā me pharusā vācā, akatā me pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.18: “kato me samphappalāpo, akatā me samphappalāpā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.21: “katā me micchādiṭṭhi, akatā me sammādiṭṭhī”ti, uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
cnd17:22.22: Evaṁ katattā ca akatattā ca uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
cnd17:23.1: Atha vā “sīlesumhi aparipūrakārī”ti uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho;
cnd17:23.6: “abhāvitā me cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti, cattāro sammappadhānāti cattāro iddhipādāti, pañcindriyānīti, pañca balānīti, satta bojjhaṅgāti, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti …
cnd17:23.7: “dukkhaṁ me apariññātaṁ, samudayo me appahīno, maggo me abhāvito, nirodho me asacchikato”ti uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
cnd17:24.1: **Kukkuccānaṁ nivāraṇan**ti kukkuccānaṁ āvaraṇaṁ nīvaraṇaṁ pahānaṁ upasamaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
cnd17:27.2: **Upekkhā**ti yā catutthe jhāne upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā cittasamatā cittappassaddhatā majjhattatā cittassa.
cnd17:27.3: **Satī**ti yā catutthe jhāne upekkhaṁ ārabbha sati anussati …pe… sammāsati.
cnd17:27.4: **Upekkhāsatisaṁsuddhan**ti catutthe jhāne upekkhā ca sati ca suddhā honti visuddhā saṁsuddhā parisuddhā pariyodātā anaṅgaṇā vigatūpakkilesā mudubhūtā kammaniyā ṭhitā āneñjappattāti—
cnd17:28.2: So ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti, evampi dhammatakkapurejavaṁ.
cnd17:28.4: Sā ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti, evampi dhammatakkapurejavaṁ.
cnd17:28.5: Atha vā dhammatakko vuccati catunnaṁ maggānaṁ pubbabhāgavipassanā.
cnd17:28.6: Sā ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti—
cnd17:29.2: Arahattavimokkhaṁ pabrūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti—
cnd17:30.3: **Pabhedanan**ti avijjāya pabhedanaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
cnd17:33.1: **Kiṁsu saṁyojano loko**ti lokassa saṁyojanaṁ lagganaṁ bandhanaṁ upakkileso.
cnd17:33.2: Kena loko yutto payutto āyutto samāyutto laggo laggito palibuddhoti—
cnd17:34.1: **Kiṁsu tassa vicāraṇan**ti kiṁsu tassa cāraṇaṁ vicāraṇaṁ paṭivicāraṇaṁ.
cnd17:34.4: **Kissassa vippahānena nibbānaṁ iti vuccatī**ti kissassa vippahānena vūpasamena paṭinissaggena paṭippassaddhiyā nibbānaṁ iti vuccati pavuccati kathīyati bhaṇīyati dīpīyati voharīyatīti—
cnd17:37.2: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṁ, ayaṁ vuccati nandī.
cnd17:37.3: Yā nandī lokassa saṁyojanaṁ lagganaṁ bandhanaṁ upakkileso, imāya nandiyā loko yutto payutto āyutto samāyutto laggo laggito palibuddhoti—
cnd17:38.3: kāmavitakko, byāpādavitakko, vihiṁsāvitakko, ñātivitakko janapadavitakko, amarāvitakko, parānudayatāpaṭisaṁyutto vitakko, lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṁyutto vitakko, anavaññattipaṭisaṁyutto vitakko.
cnd17:38.5: Ime nava vitakkā lokassa cāraṇā vicāraṇā paṭivicāraṇā.
cnd17:38.6: Imehi navahi vitakkehi loko carati vicarati paṭivicaratīti—
cnd17:39.3: **Taṇhāya vippahānena nibbānaṁ iti vuccatī**ti taṇhāya vippahānena vūpasamena paṭinissaggena paṭippassaddhiyā nibbānaṁ iti vuccati pavuccati kathīyati bhaṇīyati dīpīyati voharīyatīti—
cnd17:42.1: **Kathaṁ satassa carato**ti kathaṁ satassa sampajānassa carato viharato iriyato vattayato pālayato yapayato yāpayatoti—
cnd17:43.1: **Viññāṇaṁ uparujjhatī**ti viññāṇaṁ nirujjhati vūpasammati atthaṁ gacchati paṭippassambhatīti—
cnd17:44.1: **Bhagavantaṁ puṭṭhumāgamā**ti buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ puṭṭhuṁ pucchituṁ yācituṁ ajjhesituṁ pasādetuṁ āgamhā āgatamhā upāgatamhā sampattamhā, “tayā saddhiṁ samāgatamhā”ti—
cnd17:45.2: **Tan**ti tuyhaṁ vacanaṁ byappathaṁ desanaṁ anusāsanaṁ anusiṭṭhaṁ suṇoma uggaṇhāma dhārema upadhārema upalakkhemāti—
cnd17:48.1: **Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca vedanaṁ nābhinandato**ti ajjhattaṁ vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti;
cnd17:48.2: bahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti;
cnd17:48.3: ajjhattabahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
cnd17:49.1: Ajjhattaṁ samudayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti;
cnd17:49.4: bahiddhā samudayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti;
cnd17:49.9: ajjhattabahiddhā samudayavayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
cnd17:49.10: Imehi dvādasahi ākārehi vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto …pe…
cnd17:50.1: Atha vā vedanaṁ aniccato passanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
cnd17:50.2: Vedanaṁ dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato …pe…
cnd17:50.3: nissaraṇato passanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
cnd17:50.4: Imehi cattālīsāya ākārehi vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṁ abhivadanaṁ ajjhosānaṁ gāhaṁ parāmāsaṁ abhinivesaṁ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gametīti—
cnd17:51.1: **Evaṁ satassa carato**ti evaṁ satassa sampajānassa carato viharato iriyato vattayato pālayato yapayato yāpayatoti—
cnd17:52.1: **Viññāṇaṁ uparujjhatī**ti puññābhisaṅkhārasahagataṁ viññāṇaṁ apuññābhisaṅkhārasahagataṁ viññāṇaṁ āneñjābhisaṅkhārasahagataṁ viññāṇaṁ nirujjhati vūpasammati atthaṁ gacchati paṭippassambhatīti—
